name: metadata_miss
Description: metadata file is missing or one of the raw files listed in the Metadata file is missing

name: meteo_miss
Description: File with meteorological information is missing

name: bad_pointing
Description: Difference between requested and effective pan/tilt angle is $>=$ 3Â°

name: not_enough_dark_scans
Description: Not enough valid dark scans for this series ($\#$ valid dark scans $<$ n_valid_dark from the config file)

name: not_enough_rad_scans
Description: Not enough valid radiance scans for this series ($\#$ valid radiance scans $<$ n_valid_rad from the config file)

name: not_enough_irr_scans
Description: Not enough valid irradiance scans for this series ($\#$ valid irradiance scans $<$ n_valid_irr from the config file)

name: series_missing
Description: Check if there are any missing series (either not present or flagged by `not_enough_dark_scans'; `not_enough_irr_scans'; `not_enough_rad_scans' or `vza_irradiance')

name: half_of_unc_too_big
Description: More than 50\% of data has random error above 100\% (likely corrupted or dark data)

name: check_valid_irradiance
Description: Halt processing if `variable_irradiance' flag was triggered at previous level

name: check_valid_sequence
Description: Halt processing if there are no valid series (flagged by `not_enough_dark_scans'; `not_enough_irr_scans'; `not_enough_rad_scans' or `vza_irradiance').

name: no_clear_sky_sequence
Description: If all irradiance series are flagged with the `no_clear_sky_irradiance' flag

name: discontinuity_VNIR_SWIR
Description: Checks if the VNIR and SWIR are different by more than 25\%

name: variable_radiance
Description: More than 10\% difference between start and end $L_d$ at 550~nm

name: ld_missing
Description: Ld missing for sky reflectance correction

name: unexpected_error
Description: unexpected error during processing; catches all errors
